message: Let's split the money 60/40.  A fair deal for us both to start.
Your offer was a bit too lopsided Alice.  Let's be more realistic. This is my counter offer.
Bob, let's be fair. My turn for a slight advantage, since you weren't happy with the last one.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option.  Take it or lose money!
